name: dual_regression
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: Dual regression algorithm to investigate group-ICA results

inputs.description: 4D image containing spatial IC maps (melodic_IC) from the whole-group ICA analysis
inputs.name: Group IC Maps 4D

inputs.description: 0 or 1 (1 is recommended). Whether to variance-normalise the timecourses used as the stage-2 regressors
inputs.name: Des Norm

inputs.description: Design matrix for final cross-subject modelling with randomise
inputs.name: Design Matrix

inputs.description: Design contrasts for final cross-subject modelling with randomise
inputs.name: Design Contrasts

inputs.description: Number of permutations for randomise; set to 1 for just raw tstat output, set to 0 to not run randomise at all.
inputs.name: Number of Permutations

inputs.description: Perform thresholded dual regression to obtain unbiased timeseries for connectomics analyses (e.g., with FSLnets)
inputs.name: Thresholded Dual Regression

inputs.description: This directory will be created to hold all output and logfiles
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: List of all subjects' preprocessed, standard-space 4D datasets
inputs.name: Input Files

output-files.description: Output from stage 1 for each subject
output-files.name: Stage 1 Output

output-files.description: Output from stage 2 for each subject
output-files.name: Stage 2 Output

output-files.description: Output from stage 3 for each subject
output-files.name: Stage 3 Output
